mapper.select: SELECT PM_CODE , PM_NM , PM_SORT_ORDR , IF(PM_PARENT_NO IS NULL, 1,2) AS DEPTH , PM_PARENT_NO FROM tb_prdlst_manage WHERE DELETE_AT ='N' ORDER BY PM_DP ,DEPTH , PM_SORT_ORDR

SELECT PM_CODE ,PM_PARENT_NO ,PM_NM ,PM_DP ,(CASE WHEN PM_DP='1' THEN '제품군' WHEN PM_DP='2' THEN '자재그룹' WHEN PM_DP='3' THEN '제품계층1' WHEN PM_DP='4' THEN '제품계층2' ELSE '제품계층3' END) AS PM_DP_NM ,PM_SORT_ORDR ,PM_MEMO ,USE_AT ,DELETE_AT ,REGIST_MAN ,REGIST_DE ,UPDT_MAN ,UPDT_DE FROM tb_prdlst_manage A WHERE DELETE_AT ='N' AND PM_DP = IF(#{pm_code}='', '1', PM_DP) AND (PM_CODE = IF(#{pm_code}='', pm_code, #{pm_code}) or PM_PARENT_NO = IF(#{pm_code}='', PM_PARENT_NO, #{pm_code}) ) ORDER BY PM_DP, PM_SORT_ORDR, PM_CODE
SELECT PM_CODE , PM_PARENT_NO , PM_NM , PM_DP FROM tb_prdlst_manage WHERE DELETE_AT = 'N' AND USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY PM_DP ASC
